import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const StockRowDetail = ({ stock }) => { const {id, imgURL, name, type, quantity, supplier, note} = stock; return ( {id} {name} {type} Current: {stockQuantity}
handleQuantitySubmit(e, stock)}> setNewQuantity(+e.target.value)} />
{supplier} {stock.quantity > 0 ? 'Yes' : 'No'} {note} ); } export default StockRowDetail;
